item.description:
Psychic Development 1- The Your Energy Field

Tuesday October 16th and 30th -  November 13th - December 4th and 11th (4 week series)

7-9pm

Cost:  $180 prepay for the class

 

Presented by Lisa Campion

Learn how to clear and care for your chakras and your energy field in this practical hands-on class. Your energy field is AMAZING! And yet most of us have no idea how to take care of this part of ourselves. We will practice the basics of grounding, shielding and protecting your energy field. Perfect for empaths and energy workers or anyone that feels sensitive to energy.

 

This is a great for Reiki and psychic development students!

 

  • Learn in depths about your energy anatomy- your aura and chakras
  • Practice powerful chakra clearing techniques
  • Protect and strengthen your energy field
  • Stay grounded and centered no matter what is going on around you
  • Learn to deal with others people’s energy too!
  • Clear the energy around your living and working space

 

Contact Lisa to register 508 473-0609 or email at lisa@lisacampion.com

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: Psychic Development 1
